body.p: This will introduce to you my friend Maj A V Towns, who proposes to raise a Regt. of State according to a plan specified in the accompanying paper --
The recommendation he presents to you is signed by the leading and reliable union men in this county --
Major Towns is a gentleman of activity, daring and a considerable experience in military matters.
I recommend him and his enterprise to your favorable consideration

To His Excellency
James R. Robinson
